public class EReadableDirectory
extends EDirectoryBase
A sturdy representation of a directory providing sensory access to its contents.

asReadableDirectory()
Produce an EReadableDirectory representation of this same directory.
contents()
Produce a hashtable describing the contents of this directory.
lookupDirectory(String)
Lookup a specific directory pathname relative to this directory.
lookupFile(String)
Lookup a specific file pathname relative to this directory.

asReadableDirectory 
  public EReadableDirectory asReadableDirectory()
Produce an EReadableDirectory representation of this same directory.
Overrides:
asReadableDirectory in class EDirectoryBase
contents 
  public ReadOnlyHashtable contents()
Produce a hashtable describing the contents of this directory.
Returns:
A Hashtable mapping names of directories to EReadableDirectory objects and names of files to EReadableFile objects.
Overrides:
contents in class EDirectoryBase
lookupDirectory 
  public EReadableDirectory lookupDirectory(String path) throws IOException
Lookup a specific directory pathname relative to this directory.
Parameters:
path - A pathname (in local format) for the file desired.
Returns:
An EReadableDirectory corresonding to the path in question.
lookupFile 
  public EReadableFile lookupFile(String path) throws IOException
Lookup a specific file pathname relative to this directory.
Parameters:
path - A pathname (in local format) for the file desired.
Returns:
An EReadableFile corresonding to the path in question.
